title: And you wonder why Riot ignores us on here.
body: Veigar gets changed to remove the 100-0 facerolls and make him a more engaging champ to play and play against, and the rage is amazing.  This is making the game better, but all you people can do is whine and complain and throw out the most insane comments about other champs and such.  The reasoning people use to attack these changes which they haven't even had a chance to try yet is borderline insanity.  God forbid you have to learn how to set up your instant kill stun move properly before you get a guaranteed kill.  If you people don't start trying to use reason in your posts instead of just hawking over what everyone says and ragedownvoting it because they have reasons why this is a good thing, they're just going to keep ignoring us.

1. From what I've seen, when the changes were first announced, they were generally supported by everyone except the veigar mains. Now it seems that the people against the changes outnumber the supporters. 

2. You do know that the changes are on the PBE right? A lot of people have tried the changes, and most of them don't like it. Myself included.
